fields.value: Common Core of Data:  Public School Universe Data, 1987-1988

authorName.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value: This dataset contains records for each public elementary  and secondary school in the 50 states, the District of Columbia,  United States territories (American Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, the  Virgin Islands, and the Marshall Islands), and Department of Defense  schools outside the United States for 1987-1988. Data were reported to  the Bureau of the Census for the National Center for Education  Statistics by the state coordinators. Records in this file provide the  name, address, and telephone number of the school/associated agency,  codes for school type and locale, number of full-time equivalent classroom teachers, and students eligible for free lunch programs.

topicClassValue.value: IDRC VI. Human Dimension of International Relations

distributorName.value: Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research

distributorAffiliation.value: Institute for Social Research, University of Michigan

otherGeographicCoverage.value: Virgin Islands of the United States

value: All public elementary and secondary schools in the 50  states, the District of Columbia, United States territories (American  Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, and the Marshall  Islands), and Department of Defense schools outside the United States.
